body_html: @asimshankar I found out that it's not just RTLD_GLOBAL that matters. The symbols are actually exported through _pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so in the Python API. I was only loading libtensorflow.so with RTLD_GLOBAL, but that is not enough to make things work. Is there any easy workaround that you can see, until the fix comes out? Thanks! :)

body: @asimshankar I found out that it's not just RTLD_GLOBAL that matters. The symbols are actually exported through `_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so` in the Python API. I was only loading `libtensorflow.so` with RTLD_GLOBAL, but that is not enough to make things work. Is there any easy workaround that you can see, until the fix comes out? Thanks! :)
